description: Recite poetry by staRpauSe, who has been crystalizing his consciousness in haiku since being introduced to the Japanese poetry form in grade school. Haiku are bite sized art, perfect for triggering inspiration or introspection in a matter of seconds. Poems that your Alexa device recites will also be sent to your controller device as cards to be cherished and shared.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask staRpauSe for a haiku
Alexa, tell staRpauSe to recite a haiku
name: by staRpauSe
shortDescription: Recite poetry by staRpauSe, who has been crystalizing his consciousness in haiku since being introduced to the Japanese poetry form in grade school.
